data.title: Dome Spotlight Screening - Edward Scissorhands (1990)
data.meta_description: Credited as his most personal film, Tim Burton tells a gothic fairytale about the ultimate outsider: a half-finished artificial man with scissors for hands
data.text:
Living alone in his deceased creator's hill-top mansion, Edward (Depp) is discovered by a suburban family and taken in after impressing them with his creative hedge trimming skills. Suspicious at first, the town eventually coo over Edward's gentle demeanour and scissor-skills. But as romance begins to simmer between Edward and the familyâ€™s teenage daughter (Ryder), the town's more bigoted members turn on him. Starring Johnny Depp, Winona Rider, Diane Wiest, Alan Arkin and the great Vincent Price in his final feature role.

Trailer here

Bar from 5pm, movie at 7pm. Booking essential: to reserve a dining table or a movie beanbag please text name, date, movie and number of people to 027 590 2117.
